Html:
I just published yesterday an extension for brackets that add typescript support:
https://github.com/fdecampredon/brackets-typescript
It's compatible with 0.9.5 and written in TypeScript.

Thanks to the TypeScript team for sharing with us those services that makes possible this kind of project.

Feel free to submit bug / ask for a features
